raw_comment:
1. Mali is the lowest point on the graph and Indonesia is the highest.
2. I wonder what factors they are looking at to determine this info.
3. It shows that people around me think differently and how their lives are different around the world.
4. This graph is showing the opinion of people around the world which I think is interesting.
ace_sentences: Mali is the lowest point on the graph.
Indonesia is the highest point on the graph.
I wonder what factors they consider to determine this information.
The graph shows that people around me think differently.
The graph shows that the lives of people around the world are different.
The graph shows the opinions of people around the world.
I think that this is interesting.
